Exercise 5

<p class="box-success">

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Ad amet architecto, dicta distinctio doloremque explicabo fuga illo inventore ipsa iste libero maxime mollitia nesciunt nostrum nulla perspiciatis quidem.

<body class="bg-gray-50">

Changes the background color of the body element

<main class="container bg-white-90 py-4">

Changes the background color and (vertical) padding of the main element

<p class="bg-info-40 p-3">
